titles.title: We're In The Army Of The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We're in the army of the Lord
We're in the army of the Lord
Close your ranks brothers and sisters
We're marching to victory, in the good fight of the Lord.
We're in the victory of the Lord
We're in the victory of the Lord
All the battles are won, the enemy's on the run
In the good fight of the Lord. (Repeat.)
